technology.name: Rampant Consumerism
technology.description: The irresistible scent of success, creatively mixing fruity and floral notes with an unexpected and refreshing infusion of eternally unquenched greed.

effects.description: Income from all buildings: +4%

technology.name: The Promise
technology.description: Heights of agonised joy, the mingled moans and screams of atrocity, scents to make any mortal retch from sheer euphoria â€“ the House of Excess presents its ultimate fragrance.

effects.description: Seduce Units budget: +50%

technology.name: Ill Repute
technology.description: A delectable, vibrant bouquet of the forbidden, guaranteed to reduce even the strongest of minds to gibbering, lust-craved depravity.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Sweet Sorrow"
	(all armies)

technology.name: Invigorating Essence
technology.description: For her or for him, Invigorating Essence exudes a confident aura of unstoppable, merciless cruelty.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
Speed: +5% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Darkling Disciples
technology.description: Bold top-notes of sensuality entwined with an subtle base of relentless, pitiless brutality. This is ethereal beauty meets torment-filled death, with a lingering citrus mist.

effects.description: Devotee upkeep: -10% for Disciple Armies
Charge bonus: +5% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Pained Feaster
technology.description: A new chapter in sheer excess. Pain and pleasure mingle with the powdery scent of freshly-harvested souls to create an unforgettable vision of overwhelming power.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Keeper of Secrets units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Keeper of Secrets units
Charge bonus: +10 for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.name: Euphoric Dominance
technology.description: High notes of sandalwood and distilled soul essence ensure maximum compliance, while subtle hints of Ruinous flora transmute agonised exhaustion into unbridled ecstasy.

effects.description: Proliferate Cults cost: -20%

technology.name: Wanton Destruction
technology.description: Some days, you want every head turned in your direction â€“ but some days you want every head parted from its shoulders. On those days, only Wanton Destruction will do.

effects.description: Upkeep: -1%
Income from razing settlements: +20%

technology.name: Dark Princeâ€™s Emanation
technology.description: Proudly presenting the dark kiss of Slaanesh himself. The subtle, lingering warmth of hesitant submission gives way to overwhelming, sublime abandon.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide

Lord recruit rank: +3
	(all provinces)

Slaanesh corruption: +3
	(all provinces)

technology.name: Spreading Perfection
technology.description: A perfumed dance across the senses, an irresistible trio of desire, submission and depravity that will cause any soul to welcome Slaanesh into their heart.

effects.description:
Slaanesh corruption: +1
	(all Cultist Heroes)

Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 1
	(all Cultist Heroes)
Hero action success chance: +5% for Cultists

technology.name: Blessed Young
technology.description: Projected by the alluring top notes of inescapable seduction and freshly-flayed soul, this sophisticated fragrance is grounded in a creamy, musk-like base.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Weapon strength: +5% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Rapturous Bliss
technology.description: The entrancing smell of immortal ecstasy. Perfumed oils blend with nymph-like vanilla notes to achieve a long-lasting shiver of blasphemous pleasure.

effects.description: Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Keeper of Secrets units

technology.name: Aberrant Promiscuity
technology.description: With its fresh yet sensual musk, this intoxicating fragrance compels flesh toward flesh in any situation. Its floral top note guarantees maximum fertility.

effects.description: Growth: +15

technology.name: Grateful Enslavement
technology.description: Inspired by the sense-numbing aromas of the Circle of Indolency, this iconic Slaaneshi fragrance transforms the misery of captivity into the infinite joy of absolute submission.

effects.description: Construction cost: -8% for all buildings

technology.name: Captivating Musk
technology.description: The bewitching aroma of unbound carnality infused with irresistible self-confidence and allure, Captivating Musk is every Daemon overlord's best friend.

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -20%
Seduce Units cost: -10%

technology.name: Enriching Toil
technology.description: Blending citrus fruit with unfiltered mortal greed, let all around know that unfathomable wealth awaits those who lay waste in the Dark Prince's name.

effects.description: Upkeep: -1%
Income from sacking settlements: +20%

technology.name: Carnal Incense
technology.description: A deceptively simple blend of distilled desire and total obedience â€“ for those days when only instant gratification will do.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Narcissism"
	(all armies)
Charge bonus: +5 for Forsaken of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units

technology.name: The Divine
technology.description: Enrobe one's flesh in velvety tendrils of seduction that no soul in any known realm can possibly resist.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +40 with Slaaneshi factions

technology.name: Everlasting Gift
technology.description: A revolution in forbidden, sense-shattering fragrance, direct from the Palace of Pleasure itself, its invigorating excess is guaranteed to linger for all eternity.

effects.description: Devotees from Gift of Slaanesh: +25

technology.name: Decadent Apostles
technology.description: The heady thrill of blood-soaked victory, distilled to its delicious, agonised essence and guaranteed to reshape mere flesh into rippling perfection.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Marauders and Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh units
Enables Soporific Musk attacks for Marauders, Warriors and Chosen of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +4 for Marauders and Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh units
Melee defence: +4 for Marauders of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Chromatic Servitude
technology.description: Because even a nauseating, indescribable affront to existence itself deserves to smell like freshly-cut roses.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder units

technology.name: Darkling Delights
technology.description: Spur oneself to ever-greater feats of lust and atrocity, with a heady floral blend that evokes both Spring's first sunrise and an aeon of unspeakable torment.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
Speed: +10% for Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Slaaneshâ€™s Lash
technology.description: Fresh from the Circle of Carnality, the surprisingly fruity Slaanesh's Lash initially evokes rapture without end, before lingering on the delectable fragrance of agonised flesh.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Pavane of Slaanesh" for Keeper of Secrets units

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

technology.name: Phantomâ€™s Goria
technology.description: An ambery infusion of dream and nightmare. Its distinctively smoky layers will shred the last vestiges of sanity from any mind.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Phantasmagoria" for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.name: Rigorous Chastisement
technology.description: Nothing says indisputable power and authority like the heady fragrance of damned souls screaming for all eternity.

effects.description: Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.name: Seeking Affluence
technology.description: Presenting the bottled essence of the Circle of Avidity, offering the scintillating promise of riches beyond measure, and laced with a kiss of venal folly.

effects.description: Upkeep: -1%
Income from looting settlements: +20%

technology.name: Mortal Lust
technology.description: The gleam of fresh sweat upon warm skin; the shiver of a midnight kiss; the touch of lace upon ready flesh.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +25 with Warriors of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

technology.name: Soul Hunters
technology.description: Lavender-scented soul-stuff, captured at the precise moment of death and boldly infused with a frisson of eternal anguish.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +10 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Glorious Doomriders
technology.description: Designed for today's busy Daemonette outrider, this confident and contemporary fragrance will make its wearer feel able to charm time itself.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot and Hellflayers units
Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot and Hellflayers units

technology.name: Shards Slicing
technology.description: Untamed beauty meets enduring pain, in this sense-shattering bombardment of red berries and endlessly-repeating wounds.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Slicing Shards" for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.name: Blissful Coquetry
technology.description: As captivating as it is radiant, the enticing sweetness of Blissful Coquetry is complemented by a dazzling blend of powerfully hypnotic spices. Rapture is assured.

effects.description: Pleasurable act cost: -25%

technology.name: Blood Godâ€™s Disgust
technology.description: Inspire ever-greater acts of deviancy and indulgence, thanks to the frothy musk of the Skull Throne's blind and witless hatred of our Perfect Prince.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -25 with Khornate factions
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Khornate factions
Melee defence: +5 when fighting against Khornate factions

technology.name: Eternal Pleasures
technology.description: The entwined, peppery spices of sin and excess ensure that all fortunate enough to scent it will soon wear only a smile.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Slaanesh and Shadow spells
	(all armies)
Melee attack: +4 for Forsaken of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units

technology.name: Intoxicating Heroism
technology.description: Master-crafted by the taloned artisans of The Circle of Paramountcy, this sublimely sophisticated fragrance garbs its wearer in an aura of immeasurable power.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -15% for Cultists
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Cultists

technology.name: Alluring Sisters
technology.description: Soft. Smooth. Captivating. Abjectly terrifying. This is temptation in a bottle â€“ modern sensuality infused with timeless monstrosity.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -15% for Alluresses
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Alluresses

technology.name: Frenzied Hysteria
technology.description: An elegant bouquet of cedarwood essence and unbridled insanity, Frenzied Hysteria is inspired by the reckless savagery of starving wolf packs.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Hysterical Frenzy" for Keeper of Secrets units
